travel_info.name: Goa

travel_info.name: Jaipur
travel_info.description: The Pink City, known for magnificent forts, palaces, and vibrant culture

travel_info.name: Kerala
travel_info.description: God's Own Country, famous for backwaters, hill stations, and Ayurvedic treatments

travel_info.title: Best Time to Visit India
travel_info.content: The best time to visit most parts of India is during the winter months (October to March) when the weather is pleasant. However, hill stations are best visited in summer.

travel_info.title: Local Transportation
travel_info.content: India offers various transportation options including metro, auto-rickshaws, taxis, and app-based cabs like Uber and Ola. Always negotiate fares beforehand for auto-rickshaws.

travel_info.name: Scuba Diving
travel_info.description: Explore underwater marine life and coral reefs

travel_info.name: Trekking
travel_info.description: Experience mountain trails and scenic landscapes

travel_info.name: Indian Street Food
travel_info.regions: Available across India with regional variations
travel_info.tip: Always eat from clean, busy stalls for food safety

travel_info.name: Agra
travel_info.description: Home to the iconic Taj Mahal, one of the Seven Wonders of the World

travel_info.title: Currency and Payments
travel_info.content: Indian Rupee (INR) is the official currency. Major cities accept credit cards, but carry cash for smaller towns. UPI payment apps are widely used.
